General.Name: Nordic Lights Group Oyj
General.Description: Nordic Lights Group Oyj manufactures and sells lighting solutions for heavy-duty equipment in Europe, the Middle East, Africa, Asia-Pacific, North America, and South America. It offers work, head, driving, and signal lights for mining, construction, forestry, agriculture, and material handling, as well as halogen and high intensity discharge lights. The company offers its products through sales representatives. Nordic Lights Group Oyj was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Pietarsaari, Finland.
